music.name: Main Menu Theme
music.prompt: Upbeat retro 8-bit chiptune main menu music, playful synth melody, nostalgic arcade game feeling, energetic but not rushed, major key

music.name: Gameplay - Normal Intensity
music.prompt: Fast-paced retro chiptune gameplay music, driving beat, 8-bit synth arpeggios, Tetris-style electronic game music, medium intensity, catchy melody

music.name: Gameplay - High Intensity
music.prompt: Intense fast retro chiptune battle music, rapid 8-bit arpeggios, driving bassline, high energy electronic game music, urgent feeling, competitive

music.name: Matchmaking Lobby
music.prompt: Calm ambient chiptune waiting music, soft 8-bit pads, gentle melody, relaxing but anticipatory, retro game lobby atmosphere

music.name: Victory Music
music.prompt: Short triumphant 8-bit victory fanfare, celebratory chiptune melody, uplifting retro game win music, major key, satisfying conclusion

music.name: Defeat Music
music.prompt: Short melancholic 8-bit game over theme, descending chiptune melody, retro arcade defeat sound, minor key, gentle and sympathetic

sfx.name: Piece Move (Left/Right)
sfx.prompt: Short soft 8-bit blip sound, quick mechanical click, subtle piece movement sound, retro game audio

sfx.name: Piece Rotation
sfx.prompt: Quick 8-bit rotation sound, satisfying click with slight pitch shift, crisp mechanical turn effect, retro Tetris sound

sfx.name: Soft Drop
sfx.prompt: Very short descending 8-bit blip, quick downward pitch drop, subtle soft drop sound effect

sfx.name: Hard Drop / Lock
sfx.prompt: Satisfying 8-bit thud sound, solid impact with bass, piece locking sound, chunky retro game slam effect

sfx.name: Line Clear - Single
sfx.prompt: Pleasant 8-bit chime, single line clear sound, short ascending arpeggio, satisfying completion tone

sfx.name: Line Clear - Double
sfx.prompt: Brighter 8-bit chime sequence, double line clear sound, two-note ascending melody, more rewarding than single

sfx.name: Line Clear - Triple
sfx.prompt: Exciting 8-bit melody burst, triple line clear sound, three-note ascending arpeggio, very satisfying retro achievement

sfx.name: Line Clear - Tetris (4 lines)
sfx.prompt: Epic 8-bit fanfare, four-line Tetris clear sound, triumphant ascending melody, celebratory retro game achievement

sfx.name: Combo Bonus
sfx.prompt: Quick energetic 8-bit sparkle sound, combo multiplier effect, exciting bonus chime, retro achievement ping

sfx.name: Star Earned
sfx.prompt: Magical 8-bit sparkle chime, star collection sound, twinkling retro coin pickup effect, satisfying reward tone

sfx.name: Ability Activation - Buff
sfx.prompt: Powerful 8-bit power-up sound, ascending chiptune whoosh, positive buff activation, retro game enhancement effect

sfx.name: Ability Activation - Debuff/Attack
sfx.prompt: Aggressive 8-bit attack sound, descending chiptune zap, offensive ability launch, retro game weapon fire effect

sfx.name: Ability Activation - Ultra
sfx.prompt: Epic dramatic 8-bit ultimate ability sound, powerful chiptune explosion, legendary power activation, retro game super move

sfx.name: Ability Ready
sfx.prompt: Gentle 8-bit notification chime, ability cooldown complete sound, soft ready tone, subtle alert

sfx.name: Bomb Explosion
sfx.prompt: Retro 8-bit explosion sound, chunky chiptune bomb blast, powerful block destruction effect, satisfying boom

sfx.name: Countdown Beep (3-2-1)
sfx.prompt: Sharp 8-bit countdown beep, single urgent tone, game start countdown sound, retro timer tick

sfx.name: Countdown GO
sfx.prompt: Exciting 8-bit start tone, uplifting game begin sound, energetic GO signal, retro race start effect

sfx.name: Match Found
sfx.prompt: Exciting 8-bit fanfare, opponent found notification, uplifting match ready sound, retro game connection success

sfx.name: Button Click / UI Interaction
sfx.prompt: Clean 8-bit click sound, simple UI button press, crisp menu selection, retro interface sound

sfx.name: Button Hover
sfx.prompt: Very subtle 8-bit blip, soft UI hover sound, gentle menu highlight, quiet retro interface tone

sfx.name: Warning - High Stack
sfx.prompt: Urgent 8-bit warning alarm, danger alert sound, tense cautionary beep, retro game hazard notification

sfx.name: Game Over Sound
sfx.prompt: Classic 8-bit game over sound, descending chiptune melody, retro arcade death sound, final defeat tone

sfx.name: Pause
sfx.prompt: Soft 8-bit pause sound, gentle game suspension tone, calm menu open effect, retro pause chime

sfx.name: Resume/Unpause
sfx.prompt: Quick 8-bit resume sound, game restart tone, energetic unpause effect, retro continue chime

notes: All music tracks should loop seamlessly
SFX should have minimal silence/padding for responsive playback
Gameplay music intensity can be dynamically switched based on board height
